00003 ns::import('hygia.libs.validator.Validator');
00004 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.Response');
00005 ns::import('hygia.libs.exception.ValidatorException');
00006 
00012 class ValidatorSize extends Validator implements IValidator {
00013 
00014     private $sValidator;
00015     private $aValidationErrors;
00016 
00017     public function __construct($sValidator) {
00018         $this->sValidator = $sValidator;
00019         $this->aValidationErrors = array();
00020     }
00021 
00029     public function run(Response $oResponse) {
00030 
00031         if (!$oResponse instanceof Response) {
00032             throw new ValidatorException('Response is not of type Response');
00033         }
00034 
00035         // get body size and compare with given value
00036         $bValid = (int) $this->sValidator == $oResponse->getBodySize();
00037         if (!$bValid) {
00038             $this->aValidationErrors[] = 'Size validator failed. Expected: ' . $this->sValidator . '. Got: ' . $oResponse->getBodySize();
00039         }
00040         return $bValid;
00041     }
00042 
00048     public function getValidationErrors() {
00049         return $this->aValidationErrors;
00050     }
00051 
00052 }
